price: Hakika wachamngu watakuwa katika mahali pa amani,
footnotes: Hakika hao ambao wamejikinga nafsi zao na maasi kwa kufuata ut'iifu wa Mwenyezi Mungu wapo pahala patukufu ambapo ndani yake wao wanajipatia amani kwa nafsi zao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
